item.title: Learn in public
item.description: Today I searched the internet for something, and the first result I got from [@duckduckgo][2] was a note I wrote months ago to my future self; how meta is that. [Learn in public][1], it gives superpowers[^4]. Also, in recent years, adopting [POSSE][3] was the best thing I did for my personal development.
item.content:encoded:
Today I searched the internet for something, and the first result I got from [@duckduckgo][2] was a note I wrote months ago to my future self; how meta is that.

[Learn in public][1], it gives superpowers[^4]. Also, in recent years, adopting [POSSE][3] was the best thing I did for my personal development.
